data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Ann: Have you kept yourself informed of the controversy surrounding Facebook lately?
Jerry: No, I ____ I haven't really ____ keeping ____ to ____ lately.
Ann: I ____ checking ____ some ____, ____ it ____ that ____ is a lot ____ content ____ is ____ fake ____ inflammatory, or ____.
Jerry: Don't they have moderators who monitor that kind of material?
data.partBlankContent:
Ann: Have you kept yourself informed of the controversy surrounding Facebook lately?
Jerry: No, I gu___ I haven't really be__ keeping u_ to da__ lately.
Ann: I w__ checking o__ some arti____, a__ it se___ that th___ is a lot o_ content th__ is eit___ fake o_ inflammatory, or bo__.
Jerry: Don't they have moderators who monitor that kind of material?
data.answer:
你知道最近围绕脸书的争议吗?
杰瑞:没有，我想我最近没有跟上潮流。
我看了一些文章，好像有很多内容不是假的就是煽动性的，或者两者兼而有之。
杰瑞:他们没有版主来监督这类内容吗?
